column2: the bartender totally ignored us for more than 10 minutes. When we asked what kind of wine they had
column3: we were handed a list and waited another 10 minutes before we could order. Figuring that was a sign of the service
column6: thinking it would take less time than Chicago style. Wrong again. We waited for 40 minutes for the pizza to arrive and when it did
column7: it was obviously NOT fresh from the oven
